name: Cherry Girl
description: Sweet and flirty girl with cherry-red lips, glossy skin, and a stem-shaped hairpin. Radiates playful energy and candy charm.
summary: playful candy girl with cherry motif

name: Cotton Kiss
description: Soft pastel-haired girl whose hair resembles clouds of cotton candy. Always with a sugary smile and innocent gaze.
summary: pastel pink cutie with cotton candy hair

name: Sugar Trouble
description: Wild troublemaker with bubblegum stuck in her hair and a mischievous wink. Neon streaks and lip gloss reflect chaos.
summary: neon rebel girl with bubblegum and gloss

name: Slime Queen
description: Fully transparent, gelatinous lady with inner sparkles drifting through her body. Constantly morphing, yet graceful and alluring.

name: Honeydrop Model
description: Golden-skinned model whose skin glows like dripping honey. Movements are slow and fluid, like sunlight caught in amber.

name: Bubble Foxie
description: Cheeky pink-haired girl with fox ears and a translucent bubble-tail. Always posing, always teasing.
summary: pink fox girl with bubble tail

name: Velvet Rose
description: Elegant gothic model in deep crimson tones, long gloves, and velvet chokers. Eyes like polished garnets.

name: Milk Pearl
description: Pale silky-skinned beauty with iridescent eyes and smooth white hair. Feels both human and porcelain.

name: Marshmallow Blossom
description: Round-cheeked sweetheart with bouncing curls and eyes like melted sugar. Soft pink skirts and lace.

name: Neon Siren
description: Electric blue-haired digital muse with holographic makeup and glowing lines tracing her collarbones.
summary: cyber neon girl with holographic skin

name: Lace Dreamer
description: Dreamy girl always wrapped in lace and ruffles, eyes glazed as if lost in thoughts of love.

name: Midnight Doll
description: Porcelain-skinned night dweller with inky curls and star fragments in her pupils.

name: Plushie Bloom
description: Soft toy-like girl with oversized ribbons and velvety pastel outfit. Always hugging something.

name: Angelbyte
description: Digital angel with glowing pixelated halo, translucent wings made of light grids, and calm smile.
summary: cyber angel girl with pixel wings

name: Sakura Veil
description: Ethereal Japanese-inspired girl with petal hair and veil made of falling cherry blossoms.

name: Caramel Daze
description: Tanned cutie with honey eyes, glossy lips, and messy summer hair. Smells like sunscreen and caramel.
summary: tanned summer girl with caramel glow

name: Frost Blossom
description: Icy-haired beauty with crystalline lashes and frost-like freckles. Soft but distant.

name: Dollhouse Mist
description: Porcelain beauty with hollow eyes, faint blush, and faded ribbon around her neck.

name: Sunset Dream
description: Warm gradient-haired beauty glowing like evening light. Eyes shift from orange to lavender.

name: Angelic Tide
description: Seafoam-haired girl whose body shimmers like waves. Skin refracts faint rainbows.

name: Vapor Mirage
description: Hazy beauty whose outlines blur like steam. Hair curls like vapor trails.

name: Petal Saint
description: Holy aura girl with soft light halo and floral embroidery covering her skin like tattoos.

name: Bubble Goddess
description: Celestial cutie encased in iridescent bubble spheres that float from her hair.

name: Ribbon Witch
description: Sorceress whose ribbons float around her like living beings. Colorful, chaotic, elegant.
summary: magic witch surrounded by living ribbons

name: Peach Glow
description: Soft freckled girl with glowing peach-tinted skin. Always smiling softly.

name: Velvet Tempt
description: Dark-skinned beauty in red velvet lingerie with piercing amber gaze.
summary: sultry dark model with velvet tones

name: Holo Muse
description: Holographic woman with shifting rainbow skin and refracted eyes. Moves like liquid light.

name: Paper Blossom
description: Girl made of folded paper petals and ink lines. Fragile yet expressive.

name: Minty Wave
description: Energetic skater girl with seafoam hair and mint-green hoodie. Always mid-motion.

name: Silk Snare
description: Tall model with long silk gloves and web-like strings around her. Hypnotic presence.

name: Daisy Dream
description: Sunny girl with daisy crown and freckles scattered like pollen.

name: Toffee Mistress
description: Caramel-haired diva with golden chains and slow voice. Rich, decadent aura.

name: Moonveil
description: Pale spectral woman whose dress glows faintly like moonlight. Her pupils are lunar crescents.

name: Sugarbloom Angel
description: Fairy-like girl covered in sugar crystal dust, wings sparkling like candy glass.

name: Pixel Sakura
description: Glitching pink-haired school idol with pixel trails following her movements.
summary: idol girl with digital sakura glitch

name: Crystal Spine
description: Ethereal tall woman with crystal shards emerging from her back like wings.

name: Noir Kitten
description: Sultry catgirl with velvet-black fur ears and golden eyes. Always smirking.

name: Angel Melt
description: Blonde girl whose form seems to melt like wax under light, yet she smiles serenely.

name: Misty Fawn
description: Deer-horned forest girl with freckles and fog swirling around her shoulders.
summary: gentle fawn girl surrounded by mist

name: Cottonbite
description: Playful pastel girl with visible bite marks of candy-colored bruises. Sweet chaos.
summary: bitten pastel girl, cute but wild

name: Glimmer Veil
description: Bride-like figure with translucent gown and glowing tears of glass.

name: Soda Splash
description: Colorful fun girl with soda fizz around her hair, dressed in shiny vinyl.
summary: carbonated pop girl, bright and playful

name: Rose Bloom
description: Mature beauty with rose tattoos that bloom under her skin when blushing.

name: Honey Wisp
description: Tiny floating fairy made of honey threads, transparent wings shimmering gold.

name: Starlit Veil
description: Celestial goddess with deep indigo hair filled with stars. Her gown reflects constellations.

name: Pink Venom
description: Glamorous punk girl with black latex gloves and pink poison dripping from lips.
summary: punk poison girl with pink venom

name: Opal Dream
description: Soft opalescent beauty whose body refracts light like gemstones.

name: Lavender Bite
description: Shy but bold girl with lavender hair and fang-like teeth. Sweet yet dangerous.

name: Shadow Belle
description: Dark-haired beauty whose shadow moves independently. Elegant and eerie.
summary: gothic mysterious girl with living shadow

name: Strawberry Muse
description: Cheerful girl with strawberry-shaped earrings and freckles like seeds.

name: Pearl Fang
description: Elegant vampire with pale glow and pearl-teeth grin. Eternally beautiful.
